name: Petoverse
description: Petoverse is a virtual reality MMORPG universe within the metaverse that aims to serve as a place of enjoyment that can also provide income with Petoverse Auto-Staking & Auto-Compounding Protocol. Petoverse aims to cover all the varying interests in the crypto space, from being a utility token to integrating newer concepts of the MMORPG Metaverse. Petoverse Auto-Staking & Auto-Compounding protocol will serve as a source of passive income to $PETO holders. With 8% burned in the Inferno Pit for every transaction, the price of $PETO will keep rising and increase in value. Petoverse also has the Petoverse Insurance Fund (PIF, in short) to ensure the stability of price and the security of the holderâ€™s investments.
